Actions.Name: Bulk Load Data (data in body)
Actions.Description: Upload input data as a request body to your integration. Allowed formats are .csv and .json

Actions.Name: Bulk Load Data (attachment)
Actions.Description: Upload an input file to your integration. Allowed formats are .xlsx, .json and .csv

Actions.Name: Bulk Load Opportunities (data in body)
Actions.Description: Upload input data as a request body to your integration. Allowed formats are .csv and .json

Actions.Name: Bulk Load Opportunities (attachment)
Actions.Description: Upload an input file to your integration. Allowed formats are .xlsx, .json and .csv

Actions.Name: Get the status of the bulkload operation
Get external ID for WorkSpan ID
Actions.Description: Get the  external application’s primary unique identifier

Actions.Name: Add Audit information to WorkSpan Object
Submit Referral to Microsoft Partner Center from WorkSpan
Actions.Description: This trigger is fired when WorkSpan user asks to submit opportunity to Microsoft Partner Center

Actions.Name: Subscribe to WorkSpan Collaboration Events
Actions.Description: Subscribe to various collaboration events such as creates and updates on membership, tasks and comments to drive and enhance communication with your internal and partner network.

Actions.Name: Subscribe to WorkSpan Object Events
Actions.Description: Subscribe to various object events such as creates and updates on Opportunities to increase the visibility of your partner influence

Actions.Name: Connect an external ID to a WorkSpan ID
Actions.Description: Update WorkSpan Object with external application’s primary unique identifier
